menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh fruits and vegetables. The product of active and healthy people. It is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Lenten' Menu.
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products at all, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein through tofu and imported veggie steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' Menu.
menu.descr: В меню 'Премиум' мы используем не только красивый дизайн упаковки, но и качественное исполнение блюд. Красная рыба, морепродукты, фрукты - ресторанное меню без похода в ресторан!
